mapper.insert: INSERT INTO property_details ( property_id, content, available_date, has_elevator, has_bed, has_parking, has_heating, has_cooling, has_bath, has_microwave, has_burner, has_fridge, has_shoe_closet, has_tv, has_closet, has_dining_table, has_table_item, has_washer, has_induction, has_pet, created_at ) VALUES ( #{propertyId}, #{content}, #{availableDate}, #{hasElevator}, #{hasBed}, #{hasParking}, #{hasHeating}, #{hasCooling}, #{hasBath}, #{hasMicrowave}, #{hasBurner}, #{hasFridge}, #{hasShoeCloset}, #{hasTv}, #{hasCloset}, #{hasDiningTable}, #{hasTableItem}, #{hasWasher}, #{hasInduction}, #{hasPet}, #{createdAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, content, available_date, has_elevator, has_bed, has_parking, has_heating, has_cooling, has_bath, has_microwave, has_burner, has_fridge, has_shoe_closet, has_tv, has_closet, has_dining_table, has_table_item, has_washer, has_induction, has_pet, created_at FROM property_details WHERE property_id = #{id} AND deleted_at IS null
mapper.update: UPDATE property_details SET deleted_at = NOW() WHERE property_id = #{id} AND deleted_at IS NULL
